page.title: 12PORLOCK ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: Porlock people enjoy doing things as a community.Many of these events are held when tourists can join in as well On{Carnival Day}there is a 2 mile Fun Run,a fete,and in the evening a procession of decorated floats and a Barbeque.At the fete children can enter in fancy dress,run races and play games.Country based events include the{Sheep Dog Trials}where a few sheep are released and dog and handler drive them along a prescribed route,and the{Gymkhana}which gives the opportunity for local adults and children to demonstrate their riding and jumping skills in competition.Two {Flower Shows}are held in spring and summer,with classes for vegetables, flowers,floral display,honey,jam,cakes and wine making.Show trophies are highly coveted. (Continued Page 13)
